summary: This is an FBI report summary indicating that Jeffrey Epstein's former butler was sentenced to 18 months in prison for attempting to sell information. The document is brief and lacks specific details about the case or individuals involved beyond the basic facts.

events.title: Epstein's Butler Sentenced
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's former butler was sentenced to 18 months in prison for trying to sell information.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein had a former butler who was involved in a criminal case.
The butler was sentenced to 18 months in prison on June 20, 2010.
The butler's crime was attempting to sell information, though the specific information is not detailed.
The FBI case ID associated with this matter is 72-MM-113327.
The document is marked as 'U//FOUO' (Unclassified//For Official Use Only).
